short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension modifies the original IMDb page, so it's more suitable for MediaBiz researchers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an IMDb extension, which will help researchers to work more efficient. The most important data will be displayed on the main site, with some additional links for further research. 

For this extension to work properly you need to login into your IMDb account (or register and login if you don't have an account ), then go to "Account Settings" where you will find under "Preferences" the section "Content Settings". Here you have to set the "Title display country/region" to "Original" and check the box for "Contributors". All you have to do is now enable the extension in the upper right corner in Google Chrome. Now the extension should work. 

Feel free to suggest any additional ideas that would make the extension even better!
